summary: Provides utilities for reading and indexing sharded tar archives, supporting both local file systems and remote HTTP/HTTPS sources. It enables deterministic member lookup by building Parquet-based indices that map file references to specific shard offsets.
responsibilities: Extracting specific members from tar shards via name-based lookup
Generating deterministic indices of tar contents stored across multiple shards
Serializing and deserializing shard indices using Apache Parquet
Handling URI-based access for both local files and HTTP/HTTPS endpoints
Calculating byte offsets and sizes for individual tar members
